    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Potency](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2936)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=663" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you apply this thick, viscous oil to a weapon or suit of armor, that item immediately becomes magically potent. If the item is a weapon, it temporarily becomes a _[+1 striking_ weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380), or, if it's armor, it temporarily becomes [+1 resilient armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147). This lasts for 1 minute.
